details.title: Care Bridge Opal
details.description: Care Bridge Opal is a comprehensive web platform designed to enhance communication, transparency, and coordination in elderly care. The platform connects caregivers, families, and healthcare professionals to manage services, track updates, and browse relevant content. Built using Next.js and Payload CMS, the project focuses on modular design, high performance, and responsive user experience.
key_features: ğŸ§“ Elder Care Focused Platform: Designed specifically for elderly care coordination
ğŸ§¾ Services Showcase: Fully dynamic service listing powered by Payload CMS
ğŸ“° Blog Section: SEO-optimized blog system with filtering and search features
ğŸ›ï¸ Product Catalog: Filterable and responsive product grid with real-time content updates
ğŸ“¸ Synchronized Sliders: Interactive dual-slider system for service previews using Swiper.js
ğŸ¨ Fully Responsive UI: Mobile-first design ensuring compatibility across all screen sizes
âš¡ ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration): For fast content updates with minimal rebuild times
technical_highlights: Integrated Payload CMS as a headless backend with custom collections and fields
Developed reusable components with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI for consistent design
Implemented Swiper.js slider syncing logic for dynamic, interactive carousels
Configured dynamic routing and ISR in Next.js for performant and flexible content pages
Optimized SEO using meta tags, structured data, and dynamic Open Graph tags
Deployed seamlessly to Vercel with CI/CD for rapid updates and preview deployments

responsibilities: ğŸ”§ Setup and configured Payload CMS collections for services, blogs, and products

details.title: Planify â€“ Trello-like Task Management App
details.description: Planify is a Trello-inspired task management system that allows teams to efficiently manage their projects and tasks. With an intuitive UI and powerful functionality, users can add, edit, assign, and review tasks in a streamlined workflow. Team members are assigned to projects via drag-and-drop, and completed tasks can be submitted for admin review. The system supports full CRUD operations using JSON Server, making it ideal for testing and prototyping collaborative task boards
key_features: âš™ï¸ View all tasks in a structured layout
ğŸ“° Add new tasks with due dates and status
ğŸ›ï¸ Edit existing tasks anytime
ğŸ“± Delete tasks with confirmation
âš¡ Filter tasks by status (To Do, In Progress, Done)
ğŸ“¦ Fully functional CRUD operations via JSON Server
ğŸ§² Assign team members to projects using drag and drop
âœ… Developers can submit tasks for review from the system
ğŸ” Admin can approve or reject submitted tasks
ğŸ“‹ Trello-like workflow for intuitive task management
technical_highlights: JSON Server as a mock backend
Tailwind CSS for fast and responsive UI styling
Framer Motion for animations if used

responsibilities: âœ… I developed the entire application from scratch, focusing on building a responsive and clean UI. I handled API integration with JSON Server to simulate full CRUD functionality and ensured smooth user experience across all devices
